content: A lot of new members on the forum often ask questions about Avatar, signatures and personal text and Most of them usually have some issues setting them up. However In  this thread I created some time ago Hamza2424 suggested a guide concerning signatures and avatars.so I decided to create one coupled with the fact that I have come across some threads by new members concerning them and I don't know if an image guide has been created before.this thread will carry important information about signatures and avatar including a guide on setting it up.AvatarThis is the small sized image usually displayed in your profile or under your username when you make a post. It acts like a form of profile picture for users.Setting it upBefore heading to your profile to set up a new avatar make sure you have the avatar image ready and available on the device you are using this because the image file would be uploaded from your device and not "TALKImg" .below are criteria necessary to consider before choosing a avatar image.Rank ;To be able to upload an avatar to your profile you must be at least a full member.Resolution ; The avatar resolution must not be greater than 120px × 80px.if the image you wish to use is greater you would have to use a possible software to reduce its resolution before attempting to upload.Size ; The file size of the image you wish to use as avatar should not be greater than 100kib.File type ; The standard accepted file types are PNG, jpeg and non animated GIFs although some ordinary GIF files may work.STEP By STEP GUIDE1. Open your profile, click "forum profile information", click on "Go here" then click "choose file".now select your preferred avatar image and click upload. See images below;To remove an avatar just click on upload file without selecting any file. Signature This is a unique form of design code which is usually displayed under your profile and post.These signatures are capable of embedding links depending on the signature code.Setting it upBefore heading to your profile to apply a new signature make sure you have the signature code ready and copied to your device clipboard.signatures are limited depending on ranks.below are some factors to be considered before uploading a signature.Rank ; Signatures can be updated from Jr member to legendary ranks. However the number of maximum characters of signature code applicable varies depending on rank. Below is a breakdown.Jr member --> 150 characters maxMember --> 4000 characters maxFull member --> 4000 characters maxSr member --> 4000 characters maxHero member --> 4000 characters maxLegendary --> 4000 characters maxDisclaimer!!! ---> Be sure not to promote a scam website with your signature space . therefore check for scams before uploading a signature.promoting scam websites on your signature could lead to negative trust feedback on your profile.STEP By STEP GUIDETo apply a signature from your forum profile information click on the text box for signature and paste in the required signature code the. Click change profile as shown in the image below.To remove a signature clear all the code in the signature text box and click change profile.Note also that signature also has a few mods depending on your rank also. Below is a summary;Quote from: theymos on February 26, 2014, 09:15:18 PM- Jr. Member: No links allowed. Max 150 characters.- Member: Unlimited length.- Full member: Color allowed.- Sr. Member: Size allowed- Hero member: Background color allowed- Legendary: Background color allowed
